testsuite.name: Search for black running shoes and check size 10 availability on Nike.in

testcase.name: Search for black running shoes, verify size 10 availability, and add to cart
testcase.classname: Search for black running shoes and check size 10 availability on Nike.in

failure.message: EXPECTED RESULT: Visual signals ['Results', 'products', 'Found'] present on search results page. ACTUAL RESULT: Detected signals ['Results', 'products']; 'Found' missing.

property.name: Proofs Base Folder, includes screenshots, recording, netwrok logs, api logs, sec logs, accessibility logs
plan
property.value: 1. Navigate to https://www.nike.com/in/ and verify homepage visual signals. 2. Open the search input and enter "black running shoes". 3. Submit the search and validate the results page displays all required visual signals: "Results", "products", and "Found". 4. If all signals are present, continue to select the first matching product, verify size options, add size 10 to the bag, and confirm cart contents. 5. If any required visual signal is missing, report failure and terminate.

testcase.system-out: Final Response: Test failed: Expected visual signals ['Results', 'products', 'Found'] on the search results page, but the signal 'Found' was not detected. Unable to confirm that the results page fully loaded as required.
